Reviews.Title: Great Service!!
Reviews.Author: bahamagirl
Reviews.Content: I order a "Apple Iphone 4 unlocked" for use in the Bahamas, upon receiving the phone I learned that It still had a lock on it! I Emailed the seller who responded right away in a matter on min he adviced me what to do and upon sending him the phone IMEI # the phone was unlocked and ready for use! so now I am loving my new Apple Iphone and would and will recommend this seller to all my friends here in the Bahamas!! THANK YOU AGAIN, SO MUCH FOR THE AWSOME SERVICE.

Reviews.Title: Portable Mac Mini
Reviews.Author: N8online
Reviews.Content: I waited a long time to get a smartphone.  I first tried the Samsung Galaxy Showcase.  I really liked the Showcase.  It had a big screen with a lot of memory.  The display was great.  When the iPhone went to $75, I wanted to give it a shot so I traded the Showcase for the iPhone.  I was used to the Mac OS since I had been using one for more than 10 years.  It was definitely more simplified for me than the Showcase. The interface is really slick.  I rarely get on my computer at all these days since I got this phone.  My email stays immaculate.  I can bank, pay bills, shop, browse music, skype, listen to podcast, youtube and much more. The GPS was better on the Galaxy in my opinion.  I downloaded the Mapquest app for iPhone and have no complaints now! The swype feature on the android I thought was much better at first.  When I got used to the super smart keyboard on the iPhone, I am typing and texting just as fast, so I will call it a draw.  The camera is really good as well. It takes great pictures to add to my photo albums.  The only problem I have with iPhone is not being able to expand your memory offline. I use Netflix all the time so I can be in the room with my 3 year old so his cartoons don't make me a zombie.  I am really loving the Amazon Cloud Player app for Apple!  It helps, but you don't have to be really smart to use this phone!

Reviews.Title: el telefono bien
Reviews.Author: neonitro
Reviews.Content: excelente telefono todo bien solo que ofertan un telefono desbloqueado y no es cierto deben ser sinceros y no engañar a la gente

Reviews.Title: Over Priced
Reviews.Author: Vox Tarri
Reviews.Content: This product is great but why is it $130 more expensive on Amazon than it is directly through Apple? Save yourself some money and purchase this phone elsewhere.EDIT: It looks like Amazon corrected the price. Now it is only $50 more expensive than Apple's $549.0

Reviews.Title: From Good to Worst
Reviews.Author: Dameisha
Reviews.Content: The phone was great at first, until I realized that it always says searching and no service. I thought it was my phone company, but it was not, and not even the sim card. I know I should have service because people around me have the same service and has very good connection. The seller did not state that there were any thing wrong with the device, but ITunes says differently.

Reviews.Title: nice phone and unlocked
Reviews.Author: Jay_R
Reviews.Content: I ordered on 16 and got it by 24 sep..its very  good.. thought it was a second hand but still it looks like a new unlocked phone. I am happy to receive it as it plays very well. camera is good,.  only on the back panel there are some scratches which is not so visible..I would rate it 5 out of 5 awesome phone.

Reviews.Title: color
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Should of been black color but only had white took the white color and they sent a free case it is my daughters phone she like it but I wish they had black

Reviews.Title: Not Unlocked
Reviews.Author: Jade A.
Reviews.Content: The phone was NOT unlocked when I received it. I tried several carriers and was not able to get service added.

Reviews.Title: Iphone 4
Reviews.Author: Fernando Estrada Puente
Reviews.Content: Its a nice phone, i like it.It like because of the brand and apps availability.Its a good price.

Reviews.Content: Futures buying clients this company or person or as he calls himself, the only thing I can recommend not to buy, and to buy a new phone, no surprise to me that grabbed and proceeded to check it signal and observe the lack of several screws and especially that held the antenna so no

Reviews.Title: A fine phone
Reviews.Author: Yungping Chiang
Reviews.Content: It works good. I already have one iPad. The phone works similar with iPad.  It is different from iPad that I take iPhone to where I would go. The wifi seems better than iPad which I am not sure if setting different between the two.

Reviews.Title: excellent phone
Reviews.Author: mtexas
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone, It was a gift for my niece, and she really like it. She told me that this smart phone is excellent to have everything she needs everyday and also gets a lot of app, there are lots of free apps too. The reception is good, the sound, video, and pictures are excellent too.

Reviews.Title: False advertising.
Reviews.Author: SLSadorra
Reviews.Content: Phone is new, gorgeous, perfect except that it is NOT unlocked, as advertised. A gift recipient, like myself, cannot return an item......Aaaand Amazon is requiring me to write at least twenty words to post a review.
